Regulation Name(s): Respiratory Viral Panel Multiplex Nucleic Acid Assay
Instrumentation for Clinical Multiplex Test Systems
Specimen Type(s): Nasal swab eluted in viral transport media
Nasopharyngeal swab eluted in viral transport media
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Alere™ i Influenza A & B rapid molecular test for qualitative detection and discrimination of influenza A and B RNA from nasal and nasopharyngeal swabs using isothermal amplification on the Alere™ i Instrument
Indications for Use Summary: Rapid molecular in vitro diagnostic test utilizing isothermal nucleic acid amplification to detect and differentiate influenza A and B viral RNA in direct nasal swabs or swabs eluted in viral transport media from patients with respiratory infection symptoms, as an aid in differential diagnosis of influenza A and B infections in conjunction with clinical and epidemiological risk factors
